alert.note: Alert for Essex (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Caledonia, eastern Orleans and northwestern Essex Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Barton Village, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport City, Island Pond, Orleans, Derby Center, Charleston, Westmore, Orleans Village, Glover, Brownington, Sutton, Coventry, Barton, Sheffield, Brownington Village, Derby Line Village, Morgan, Warren Gore, Averys Gore, Holland and Willoughby. This includes Interstate 91 between mile markers 147 and 177. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern Vermont.
